extends Object
    Nodes are the constituing element of a tree.

    franz.beslmeisl at googlemail.com

    • Constructor Detail

      • Node

        public Node(String text)
        Creates a node with the specified text. Default colors are black for the text, white for the background and red for the border.
        Parameters:
        text - the text to be displayed.

      • Node

        public Node()
        Creates a node with empty text.

    • Method Detail

      • xShift

        protected void xShift(float dx)
        Shifts horizontally the subtree the root of which is this.
        Parameters:
        dx - the amount to shift this to the right.
